column5: any kayak fishers in the toronto arealooking to make friends to go out kayak fishing just recently got a kayak . i am retired so lots of time to fish lol i know only a couple of months left this year but i am hoping to find someone to go to the ontario kayak fishing series next year i am partially disabled so dont drive but will always help with gas and other expenses i can get to most waters in pickering and scarborough with my rig also i just got my first float rod/reel and love to river fish
